description.narrative: New Element, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: New Element

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: UNICEF-Burkina Faso strengthened the operational and human resources capacity in response to the growing humanitarian crisis. The emergency unit is operational and two new zonal offices were set up, together with other UN agencies. The capacity of the existing Dori office was reinforced. The cluster activation defined clear accountability and strengthened UNICEF's leadership in Education, Nutrition, WASH and Child protection. Through the Rapid response mechanism coordinated by UNICEF and funded by ECHO, 1,052 emergency-affected households in the Nord, Est and Centre-Nord regions received essential non-food items such as mosquito nets, blankets and sanitation and protection materials | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:07/02/2020
